name: axon
description: An application for creating ML models

scripts.generate: yarn workspace server generate && yarn workspace client generate
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace client build" "yarn workspace server build"
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace client serve" "yarn workspace server start"
scripts.dev: yarn generate && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace client dev" "yarn workspace server dev"
scripts.dockerdev: docker build --build-arg AXON_VERSION=edge -t axon:local . && docker run -t -i -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v wpilib-axon-volume:/usr/src/app/packages/server/data -p 3000:3000 -p 4000:4000 axon:local

author: WPILib <developers@wpilib.org>
